title: Annihilation
description: Don Alfonzo and his former enforcer Nico must put aside their personal feud to ward off a deadly onset of attacks against the family. An Italian ally turned rival has joined forces with a Russian mobster to rub-out the entire Giacanti clan in retaliation for Giuseppe's murderous act. Meanwhile, Nico's son has been abducted and the kidnapper is someone no one ever suspects. Alfonzo, Nico and Giuseppe are on a hunting party, working against the clock to save a boy caught in the middle of a bloody war.Two unlikely rivals, Selange and Ariana find themselves in a unified battle to protect their children and in the end a trail of blood is what remains. Will help arrive before it's too late, or will the Giacanti massacre of the past revisit on the innocent once more?Find out in this intense sixth volume of the action-packed series, Annihilation.Product Details
author: S.W. Frank
